review: It works as advertised. The UI is quick and well designed. The one thing it really needs is the ability to set a minimum bitrate for streaming. My internet connection is marginal for streaming HD, but can easily handle it with a little buffering. Unlike YouTube, Netflix, etc, I can't set the minimum bitrate, so the bitrate I can watch Amazon streamed stuff is at the mercy of their algorithm, which prioritizes no pauses over high quality.
